item.description: HAPPY HOUR at Avon Old Farms Inn in Avon starting at 5 pm. We?ve been here many times and our visit has always been fantastic! A great place to come after work to start the weekend. As usual, they?ll have delicious hors d?oeuvres. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 Farmington (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 6 miles to Rt. 44, facility directly across the street.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.
item.why: You'll meet new and old friends and enjoy delicious appetizers.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Happy Hour
